pages.text: $(italic)Whenever you leave your home, you carry half a tool shed with you. Not really worth mentioning, given the amount of stone you carry around with you. Nevertheless, a universal tool that combines the abilities of a pickaxe, axe and shovel would suit you.$()$(br)It's not as efficient in the individual tasks, but it's much better than having to change tools every three seconds.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The multitool serves as a pickaxe, shovel, axe and hoe at the same time. However, due to its special shape, it can not be formed from diamond, but only from iron.
